subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Possibly from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*luk||sheep}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}; STEDT). Cognate with {{och-l|羭|sheep}}, {{cog|bo|ལུག||sheep}}.

Other etymologies have been proposed:
* {{zh-ref|Boodberg (1937)}} relates it to {{cog|bo|ཕྲུག||calf}}, which {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} deems unlikely.
* {{zh-ref|Norman (1988)}} suggests that it may be a loan from Altaic; compare {{cog|mn|ᠲᠤᠭᠤᠯ||calf}}, {{cog|mnc|ᡨᡠᡴᡧᠠᠨ||calf}}.
* It could also be related to {{och-l|畜|to nourish; domestic animal}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
